member.name: M:WPFLocalizeExtension.BaseExtensions.BaseLocalizeExtension`1.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the BaseLocalizeExtension class.
member.param: Three types are supported: Direct: passed key = key; Dict/Key pair: this have to be separated like ResXDictionaryName:ResourceKey Assembly/Dict/Key pair: this have to be separated like ResXDictionaryName:ResourceKey
member.remarks: This constructor register the OnCultureChanged on LocalizeDictionary to get an acknowledge of changing the culture

member.name: M:WPFLocalizeExtension.BaseExtensions.BaseLocalizeExtension`1.ProvideValue(System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Provides the Value for the first Binding
member.returns: The found item from the .resx directory or null if not found
member.remarks: This method register the OnCultureChanged on LocalizeDictionary to get an acknowledge of changing the culture, if the passed type of . !PROOF: On every single , Window, and Page, there is a new SharedDP reference, and so there is every time a new BaseLocalizeExtension! Because of this, we don't need to notify every single DependencyObjects to update their value (for GC).
member.exception: thrown if is not type of

member.returns: True if the resolve was success, otherwise false.
member.exception: If the Assembly, Dict, Key pair was not found.

member.name: M:WPFLocalizeExtension.Extensions.OddsFormatExtension.ProvideValue(System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Provides the Value for the first Binding
member.remarks: This method register the OnCultureChanged on LocalizeDictionary to get an acknowledge of changing the culture, if the passed type of . !PROOF: On every single , Window, and Page, there is a new SparedDP reference, and so there is every time a new BaseLocalizeExtension! Because of this, we don't need to notify every single DependencyObjects to update their value (for GC).
member.returns: The found item from the .resx directory or null if not found.
member.exception: thrown if is not type of .

member.returns: TRUE if the binding was setup successfully, otherwise FALSE (Binding already exists).
